description: My buddy Kendall who used to do camera work for Dirk Yates contacted me recently and told he he'd moved out to the East Coast near a big Marine base and asked if I'd be interested in checking out some of the hot guys he's been able to find. Of course my answer was yes! So, Kendall sent me over today's War Chest hottie, Derrick.Derrick has been a Marine for about six years, he's from a small town in Oklahoma and he's been to Iraq. Derrick says he's a typical guy, loves tits and ass but he's definitely open-minded. He says he's experimented with guys a couple of times but nothing major. He tells us about a couple of sexual situations both in the barracks and aboard ship. Derrick is a big guy standing 6' 3' tall and weighing in at around 215 pounds. He's sporting a 7.5' uncut cock and once he comes out of his PT shorts, we get to see the jewel in all its glory. Kendall asks him what size shoe he wears and Derrick says a size 12. Kendall comments that we all know what that means.After he's worked himself up in the living room, Kendall follows Derrick to the bedroom where he continues the show. I think you're gonna like this big Marine. I know I sure did.
title: Derrick, Scene #01
